channel.title: Well after trying so hard i failed to complete a webclient
channel.description:
well i Followed Rics Tutorial on making a webclient i did everything he said except using fileden i used my own webhosting server the link is an example www.rspsname.com/cache.zip well if you put exactly that link the cache download pops out and says if u wana download right? so its the same as fileden anyways the main problem is here i added sprites i signed the jar client and i made the webclient html doc so wen i upload everything and i see java loading and a white box with java cup i see a small red x at the top left corner i clicked on it clicked error details ( yes i know how to read java im not that much of a noob) Well after i clicked the error this came up
Java Plug-in 1.6.0_25 Using JRE version 1.6.0_25-b06 Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM User home directory = C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator ---------------------------------------------------- c: clear console window f: finalize objects on finalization queue g: garbage collect h: display this help message l: dump classloader list m: print memory usage o: trigger logging q: hide console r: reload policy configuration s: dump system and deployment properties t: dump thread list v: dump thread stack x: clear classloader cache 0-5: set trace level to ---------------------------------------------------- load: class client.class not found. java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass0(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadCode(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Exception: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class
Yes i understand that the client.class file is missing so i uploaded it to the website server then it said the same thing with class30_sub1 something like that then i uploaded that class file well after 38 class files updated i kept getting even more missing class file errors so i decided to make the class files into a zip then upload it to server and extract it there so... the webclient java comes out and while the blue thing is spinning around java it freezes if anyone knows what exactly are the class files the web host needs so it can get to start downloading the cache please tell me :confused: anyways im not sure what i did wrong im pretty sure i followed the tutorial correctly Btw im using pkplanet client im trying to make that into a webclient if that helps http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=433417.0 thats the version of pk planet im using i did not leech it cuz i removed donators and completely changed the home and godwars well if anyone can make this possible and get a webclient working perfectly for this source i will give them co-owner plus the server is 24/7

item.title: Well after trying so hard i failed to complete a webclient
item.dc:creator: @Dj_Nm.E Dj Nm.E
item.description:
@Dj_Nm.E wrote:

sorry i did mean client…

Read full topic

????????????????? lol you mean client?

item.title: Well after trying so hard i failed to complete a webclient
item.dc:creator: @Dj_Nm.E Dj Nm.E
item.description:
@Dj_Nm.E wrote:

okay try this:
delete all your class files and recompile.
(make a copy of you server before trying)
this is how i fixed the same problem.

hope it helps

Read full topic
item.source: Well after trying so hard i failed to complete a webclient

item.title: Well after trying so hard i failed to complete a webclient
item.dc:creator: @zetu_giga zetu giga
item.description:
@zetu_giga wrote:

well i Followed Rics Tutorial on making a webclient i did everything he said except using fileden i used my own webhosting server the link is an example www.rspsname.com/cache.zip well if you put exactly that link the cache download pops out and says if u wana download right? so its the same as fileden

anyways the main problem is here i added sprites i signed the jar client and i made the webclient html doc

so wen i upload everything and i see java loading and a white box with java cup i see a small red x at the top left
corner i clicked on it clicked error details

( yes i know how to read java im not that much of a noob)

Well after i clicked the error this came up

Java Plug-in 1.6.0_25
Using JRE version 1.6.0_25-b06 Java HotSpot™ Client VM
User home directory = C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator

c: clear console window
f: finalize objects on finalization queue
g: garbage collect
h: display this help message
l: dump classloader list
m: print memory usage
o: trigger logging
q: hide console
r: reload policy configuration
s: dump system and deployment properties
t: dump thread list
v: dump thread stack
x: clear classloader cache
0-5: set trace level to

load: class client.class not found.
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class
at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass0(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadCode(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager.createApplet(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Exception: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class

Yes i understand that the client.class file is missing so i uploaded it to the website server then it said the same thing
with class30_sub1 something like that then i uploaded that class file well after 38 class files updated i kept getting even more missing class file errors so i decided to make the class files into a zip then upload it to server and extract it there

so… the webclient java comes out and while the blue thing is spinning around java it freezes
if anyone knows what exactly are the class files the web host needs so it can get to start downloading the cache
please tell me
anyways im not sure what i did wrong im pretty sure i followed the tutorial correctly

Btw im using pkplanet client im trying to make that into a webclient if that helps

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

thats the version of pk planet im using i did not leech it cuz i removed donators and completely changed the home and godwars well if anyone can make this possible and get a webclient working perfectly for this source
i will give them co-owner plus the server is 24/7
